title:
GPTutor: Great Personalized Tutor with Large Language Models for
  Personalized Learning Content Generation
authors: Eason Chen, Jia-En Lee, Jionghao Lin, Kenneth Koedinger
abstract:
We developed GPTutor, a pioneering web application designed to revolutionize
personalized learning by leveraging the capabilities of Generative AI at scale.
GPTutor adapts educational content and practice exercises to align with
individual students' interests and career goals, enhancing their engagement and
understanding of critical academic concepts. The system uses a serverless
architecture to deliver personalized and scalable learning experiences. By
integrating advanced Chain-of-Thoughts prompting methods, GPTutor provides a
personalized educational journey that not only addresses the unique interests
of each student but also prepares them for future professional success. This
demo paper presents the design, functionality, and potential of GPTutor to
foster a more engaging and effective educational environment.
